      Methods in coupon.sys.core.dao.db that throw ConnectionPoolException

      void CustomerDaoDb.addCouponToCustomer​(Coupon coupon, Customer customer)
      This method adds a coupon to a customer.
      void CompanyDaoDb.createCompany​(Company company)
      Create Company, the method checks if the company already exists if it doesn't it crates it and if does throws exception
      void CouponDaoDb.createCoupon​(Coupon coupon)
      This method creates the coupon's record into the data base, using the received coupon parameter.
      void CustomerDaoDb.createCustomer​(Customer customer)
      Create Customer, the method checks if the company already exists if it doesn't it crates it and if does throws exception
      Collection<Company> CompanyDaoDb.getAllCompanies​()
      Get all companies from Company table
      Collection<Coupon> CouponDaoDb.getAllCoupons​()
      This method receives all the coupon's records of all the coupons from the data base.
      Collection<Customer> CustomerDaoDb.getAllCustomers​()
      This method receives all the customer's records of all the customers from the data base.

      Get company from Company table by ID Return connection to pool
      long CompanyDaoDb.getCompanyId​(String companyName)
      Get company from Company table by ID
      Coupon CouponDaoDb.getCoupon​(long id)
      This method receives the coupon's record from the data base, using the received coupon's id parameter.
      Collection<Coupon> CompanyDaoDb.getCoupons​(long id)
      Get all coupons from a Company on Coupon table
      Collection<Coupon> CustomerDaoDb.getCoupons​(Customer customer)
      This method receives all the logged customer's coupons from the records of the data base.
      Collection<Coupon> CouponDaoDb.getCouponsByType​(CouponType couponType)
      This method receives all the records of coupons that are in the wished category from all of the coupons from the data base.
      Customer CustomerDaoDb.getCustomer​(long id)
      This method receives the customer's record from the data base, using the received customer's id parameter.
      long CustomerDaoDb.getCustomerId​(String customerName)
      Get customer from Customer table by ID
      List<Coupon> CouponDaoDb.getOldCoupons​()
      method that gets id's of coupons which have expired and returns a list of those coupons

      A method for login into the system through passing user name and password.
      Long CustomerDaoDb.login​(String name, String password)
      A method for login into the system through passing user name and password.
      void CompanyDaoDb.removeCompany​(Company company)
      Remove company from Company table and from Company_Coupon table Return connection to pool
      void CouponDaoDb.removeCoupon​(Coupon coupon)
      This method removes the coupon's record from the data base, using the received coupon parameter.
      void CustomerDaoDb.removeCustomer​(Customer customer)
      This method removes the customer's record from the data base, using the received customer parameter and removes the customer from joined table
      void CompanyDaoDb.updateCompany​(Company company)
      Update company password, email and name changes from Company table Return connection to pool
      void CouponDaoDb.updateCoupon​(Coupon coupon)
      This method updates some columns in the coupon's record in the data base, using the received company parameter.
      void CustomerDaoDb.updateCustomer​(Customer customer)
      This method updates some columns in the customer's record in the data base, using the received customer parameter.
